description.detailed: Testcase was causing a bug before this fix: https://github.com/pasdoc/pasdoc/commit/00c4e66ae1962398ff4f2ed76fbb2facbfaf84c0 In this case, class has an ancestor, but for PasDoc the ancestor type is not "CIO", as it's an alias (and potentially, PasDoc doesn't even know the unit with it, so it really cannot determine it's CIO).
